issue.title: [Java] Support comparing value ranges for dense union vector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7616](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7616). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After we support dense union vectors, we should support range value comparisons for them.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7616?focusedCommentId=17060587) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6355
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6355>
